sentences:
Regina Hall ( born December 12 , 1970 ) is an American film and television actress and comedian .
She is perhaps best known for her lead role as Brenda Meeks in the Scary Movie film series ( 2000 – 2006 ) .
Hall , who was an English major in college and studied journalism in graduate school , envisioned a career as a journalist , but ventured into acting in her late twenties .
Hall has appeared on numerous television series , most prominently in a recurring role on the comedy series Ally McBeal ( 2001 – 2002 ) .
Her other significant films include The Best Man ( 1999 ) and its sequel The Best Man Holiday ( 2013 ) , Love & Basketball ( 2000 ) , Malibu 's Most Wanted ( 2003 ) , Think Like a Man ( 2012 ) and its sequel Think Like a Man Too ( 2014 ) , About Last Night ( 2014 ) , Vacation ( 2015 ) and Girls Trip ( 2017 ) .
